text: I tried to define array in font.json but it throws error :sob:
Any reference example will be helpful if you can share:slightly_smiling_face:

Hi everyone,
Is there a repository of quote templates as assets just like there is for website?

Hi HubSpot Experts!

I’ve been trying to add a new section to the Settings modal box of Landing Pages (Screenshot) with their fields.
It’s important to mention that each page created with this landing page must use its settings for SEO purposes.
Any idea how to do this? Or any hint? I’ve been looking for HubSpot Documentation about Landing Pages but found nothing.
Thanks very much!

You can't customize that section, you can rather create a custom module with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/export-to-template-context|export_to_template_context=true> and use it's fields in the template
